ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] About Intel. and learning.....................
ygData.msgSnippet: no for fighting skills the important factor is dex and agi, I have a WE rogue who has over 15o agi and about 175 dex but dumb as a rock on wis/int and his
ygData.messageBody:
no for fighting skills the important factor is dex and agi, I have a WE
rogue who has over 15o agi and about 175 dex but dumb as a rock on wis/int
and his fighting skills fly through the roof, try buffing up your dex and
agi a bit it should help


----- Original Message -----
From: <wolffmanus@...>
To: <EQCheats@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 18, 2003 7:27 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] About Intel. and learning.....................


> I am working up a Bar. Shaman and have made it so far to 12th level,
> the starting Intel. is 60 for the class/race. I Got a really great
> set of arms (Giant scalemail arms) it give +3 wis, +20 hps -3 int
> which reduces my intel to 57. I Juat got a Good spear for my class
> and level and am trying to learn it up in skill levels, I have added
> 10 points to Pierceing and been stabing the "Heck" out of anything I
> con Light Blue or higher and have not gone up one poing in pierceing.
> Now to what I wanted to know.....
>
> Does the Dif. between an intel. of 60 and that of 57 make any change
> in how well I Learn skills with use? If so then I have a great set of
> arms that a spell slinger can use on the server I am on and if not
> then how high do I need to raise my Intel to learn quicker?
>
> Thanks..
>
> Frezslice
> Bar. Shaman of the
> 12th Circle
> unguilded as yet ...:)
